name: typescript
description: This an example of using esptool-js with parcel and typescript

scripts.genDocs: npm run genDocs:root && shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r ../../docs dist
scripts.copy:binaries: shx mkdir -p dist/binaries && shx cp -r src/binaries/* dist/binaries/ || echo no bins
scripts.parcel:build: cross-env PARCEL_WORKERS=0 parcel build src/index.html --no-optimize --public-url ./ && npm run copy:binaries
scripts.clean:cache: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path .parcel-cache) { try { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .parcel-cache -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Host 'cache busy, retry soft clean'; Get-ChildItem .parcel-cache -Recurse -Force | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }" || shx rm -rf .parcel-cache || echo .parcel-cache busy, skipped
